amendatorysection.para: Every applicant for a license to practice optometry shall: (1) Present proof that he or she is a graduate of an accredited school or college of optometry; and (2) pass an examination approved by the board. The examination shall cover all subject matter included in the practice of optometry.

crossreference.para: Credentialing, general requirements and issuance procedures, see section 38-121 et seq.
